data.title: CRAYON SHIN-CHAN: O-O-O-NO SHINNOSUKE Coming to Amazon Prime Video (Japan)
data.meta_description: CRAYON SHIN-CHAN: O-O-O-NO SHINNOSUKE trailer. Video courtesy of Amazon Prime Video. © Yoshito Usui/Futabasha ? Shin-Ei ? TV Asahi ? ADK Amazon Original CRAYON SHIN-CHAN SPINOFF Season 4 to Stream Exclusively Starting May 31st Source: Amazon Prime Vi...
data.text:
Amazon Original CRAYON SHIN-CHAN SPINOFF Season 4 to Stream Exclusively Starting May 31st Source: Amazon Prime Video, Wright Film Inc. press releases Special Thanks to Richard Jeffery and Ayame Yamamoto

A SCIFI JAPAN EXCLUSIVE

Amazon announced the latest installment in its CRAYON SHIN-CHAN SPINOFF (???????????, Kureyon Shinchan Gaiden) series which is highly rated on Amazon Prime Video. CRAYON SHIN-CHAN: O-O-O-NO SHINNOSUKE (??????????? ????????????, Kureyon Shinchan Gaiden o o o no Shinnosuke) will start streaming exclusively with unlimited viewing on Amazon Prime Video from May 31, 2017. The fourth spinoff depicts a small country town overrun by yokai monsters and is complete in 13 seven-minute episodes, with new episodes streaming every Wednesday. Amazon Prime members can watch and download the programs via the free Amazon Prime Video app for iOS and Android mobile devices, Amazon Fire TV, Fire TV Stick, Fire tablets, game consoles, smart TVs and online at amazon.co.jp/primevideo.

“Children love dinosaurs, robots, aliens, idol singers and yokai monsters,” commented director Akira Shigino. “Will the yokai-packed O-O-O-NO SHINNOSUKE be really popular with kids? I’m both a little nervous and a little relaxed. Shin-chan appears as a yokai and uses their battle techniques. His dignified figure is different from usual. Shin-chan is a lonely yokai looking for his mother. He meets a girl. She tells him her dreams. Their thoughts intersect in the port town.” “He’s a yokai, everyone. Shinnosuke becomes a yokai in Season 4,” commented series showrunner Wataru Takahashi. “Even though he’s just a kindergartner who can call up storms, he’s still a yokai. It’s scary. And funny. In a peaceful port town. Strange things happen all the time. Everyday there’s something surprising. Shinnosuke arrives looking for his mother and meets Fumie, a girl who loves money. They form a tag team to solve the case. How? I can’t reveal that here. Only Prime members can find out. So, go get Prime!” Amazon Prime members can currently watch every episode from all three CRAYON SHIN-CHAN SPINOFF series. In Season 1, ALIEN VS. SHINNOSUKE (????????? ???????vs.?????, Kureyon Shinchan Gaiden Eirian vs. Shinnosuke, 2016), Shin-chan encountered an alien in a drifting spaceship in his first locked-room thriller. In Season 2, TOY WARS (??????????? ????????, Kureyon Shinchan Gaiden Omocha Uoozu, 2016), Shinnosuke joins the Kasukabe Defense Force to fight toys that came to life burning for revenge against the humans who discarded them. In Season 3, LONE WOLF AND FAMILY (??????????? ?????, Kureyon Shinchan Gaiden Kazokuzure Ookami, 2017), Hiroshinosuke takes his family on a journey to spread the Nohara style of butt-swordplay. Each series can also be enjoyed as a 91-minute theatrical version (seven-minute x 13 episodes). ? CRAYON SHIN-CHAN: O-O-O-NO SHINNOSUKE Synopsis A small country town. Recently, the town has witnessed many strange incidents. A yokai kindergartner O-O-O-No Shinnosuke and his yokai father Tamatama Dad arrive in town. They are said to be looking for the yokai Big Butt Mom who has run away from home. When an elementary school girl Fumie Sakura is suddenly attacked by the mysterious Fuzzy Wuzzy, a superfluous-hair yokai, Shinnosuke goes to her aid. Their encounter is the start of the greatest yokai case in the small town’s history. Original: Yoshito Usui (Rakuda) Serialized in Gekkan Manga Town (Futabasha) Director: Akira Shigino Series showrunner: Wataru Takahashi Production: TV Asahi, Shin-Ei Animation Voice actors Shinnosuke: Akiko Yajima Misae: Miki Narahashi Hiroshi: Toshiyuki Morikawa Himawari: Satomi Korogi Fumie: Etsuko Kozakura

Amazon is investing heavily in the development of original series for Prime Video, including Japanese dramas, comedies, documentaries, kids and variety shows. Amazon has announced more than 20 new titles, including the series, PRIME JAPAN, HAPIMARI (Happy Marriage), BUSINESSMEN VS. ALIENS, FUKUYADO HONPO KYOTO LOVE STORY, HARUMI`S KITCHEN, CRAYON SHIN-CHAN SPINOFF series, HITOSHI MATSUMOTO PRESENTS DOCUMENTAL series, ULTRAMAN ORB: THE ORIGIN SAGA, HIDEHIKO ISHIZUKA`S SAKE TOUR, THE BACHELOR JAPAN and more available or coming soon for Prime members in Japan. To learn more, visit amazon.co.jp/primevideo.

About Amazon Video

Amazon Video is a premium on-demand entertainment service that offers customers the greatest choice in what to watch, and how to watch it. Amazon Video is the only service that provides all of the following: • Prime Video: Thousands of movies and TV episodes, including popular licensed content plus critically acclaimed and award-winning Amazon Original Series from Amazon Studios like MOZART IN THE JUNGLE, THE MAN IN THE HIGH CASTLE, TRANSPARENT, BOSCH and TUMBLE LEAF, Japan Original Series such as KAMEN RIDER AMAZONS, HAPIMARI (Happy Marriage), BUSINESSMEN VS. ALIENS, FUKUYADO HONPO KYOTO LOVE STORY, HARUMI’S KITCHEN, CRAYON SHIN-CHAN SPINOFF series, HITOSHI MATSUMOTO PRESENTS DOCUMENTAL, ULTRAMAN ORB: THE ORIGIN SAGA, HIDEHIKO ISHIZUKA`S SAKE TOUR, etc., available for unlimited streaming as part of an Amazon Prime membership. Prime Video is also now available to customers in more than 200 countries and territories around the globe at primevideo.com. • Rent or Own: Hundreds of thousands of titles, including new-release movies and current TV shows available for on-demand rental or purchase for all Amazon customers • Instant Access: Instantly watch anytime, anywhere through the Amazon Prime Video app on TVs, PlayStation, iOS and Android mobile devices, Amazon Fire TV, Fire TV Stick and Fire tablets, or online. For a list of all compatible devices visit amazon.co.jp/gp/video/getstarted. • Premium Features: Top features like 4K Ultra HD, High Dynamic Range (HDR) and mobile downloads for offline viewing In addition to Prime Video, the annual Amazon Japan Prime membership (3,900 yen including tax) offers unlimited use of expedited shipping and designated time/date delivery at no extra charge, more than one million songs and hundreds of playlists and stations with Prime Music, unlimited photo storage with Prime Photos, one free book to borrow every month with the Kindle Owners’ Library, and more. To sign-up for Prime or to find out more visit amazon.co.jp/primevideo.

About Amazon
